member.name: T:Selenium.StrongTyped.Controls.HtmlElement
member.summary: Base HtmlElement using the methods from IWebElement to be used by the particular control.

member.name: M:Selenium.StrongTyped.Controls.HtmlElement.#ctor(OpenQA.Selenium.IWebElement)
member.summary: Stores the element, so can be used to call the methods on the element. Used for the FindElements method.
member.param: The element to store in this class.

member.name: M:Selenium.StrongTyped.Controls.HtmlElement.#ctor(OpenQA.Selenium.ISearchContext,OpenQA.Selenium.By,System.Int32,System.Boolean)
member.summary: Finds the element or list of elements from the context, using the passed in selector. It waits upto 30 seconds to find the control before exiting.
member.param: The base element to search from.
The by selector to be search for.
The number of seconds to wait.
If the search element is a list or a single control.

member.name: M:Selenium.StrongTyped.Controls.HtmlElement.#ctor(OpenQA.Selenium.ISearchContext,OpenQA.Selenium.By,System.TimeSpan,System.Boolean)
member.summary: Finds the element or list of elements from the context, using the passed in selector. It waits for as long as you specify.
member.param: The base element to search from.
The by selector to be search for.
The timespan for how long to wait.
If the search element is a list or a single control.
